name: places/ChIJ3YYzsJz2wokRXbWtckGD7jU
adrFormatAddress: 3920 Broadway, New York, NY 10032, USA

editorialSummary.text: Wireless provider supplying phones, tablets & accessories, plus cell phone & device data plans.

originalText.text: I was completely surprise with the unprofessionalism at this location, 3920 Broadway on 164 street and Broadway. My mother visited this facility to buy a new phone, as her phone had broken down. The young lady whom took care of her sold her a A14 5G phone. This young lady charge my mother almost $700.00. Which clearly this is not the price for the phone nor any service provided. My mother was so dissatisfied of the price, but as she needed a phone she just proceed to purchase. On the other hand, my mother also constantly ask why this was this price. The young lady, was arrogantly and highly rude as if it was a bothersome for a client to ask questions. When your job title is to strictly take care of the client and there services. My Mom is very fluent in both English and Spanish she completely understood everything including the price. I went by the store again, with my mother to ask why was she charge so much for an UPGRADE. Again her unprofessionalism, and her sarcasm is truly giving this store a horrible  feedback. She as well spoke to me as, if I did not quit understand her fees. The young lady, told us again to call 611,  that they can explain to us better. When I called I spoke to a representative and she did not see these charges of this big lump sum. The customer service rep, was as well in shock with the fees. Therefore, where did my mother money go to, we have her bank statements whom clearly states the charges. I past by another store and this was not even half of the price. She DISMISSED US very disrespectful of her part to not answer a client questions.  In my years as well being a Metro Pcs, customer have I never, experience such a thing. I will love for someone to contact me back, and give me a great explanation as per these charges. I'm highly disgusted and feel like they took my mother kindness for granted.

originalText.text: Came to the store to upgrade my phone, Sabrina took her time to ask questions and show me options of phones I was interested in. She's very helpful and efficient!!!! 10/10 reccomend! Amazing service

text.text: Came to the store to upgrade my phone, Sabrina took her time to ask questions and show me options of phones I was interested in. She's very helpful and efficient!!!! 10/10 reccomend! Amazing service

originalText.text: Came in looking for a phone and Sabrina told me that I was eligible for an upgrade and I didn't even know it. She helped me and guided me and gave me a lot of insightful information! My new favorite store!

originalText.text: Cheating sellers, they sold me an iPhone without headphones or 3.5 jack either, that is to say an opened boxe selt as a new phone... they are hungry to sell and not thinking of providing good service to customers.
